description:
Misora Kanata is a first-year student on the Takanosaki High School cheerleading team. She won a national championship in middle school, but can’t jump after a mistake in a competition. She befriends Suzuha, Shion, Anna, Nodoka, and Megumi to form the PoMPoMs. Their new team goes beyond cheerleading to reach the hearts of the people they cheer on. They might just change the world!

(Source: Crunchyroll, edited)

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Cheerleading
tags.description: Centers around the activity of cheerleading.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Acrobatics
tags.description: The art of jumping, tumbling, and balancing. Often paired with trapeze, trampolining, tightropes, or general gymnastics.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: Rehabilitation
tags.description: Prominently features the recovery of a character who became incapable of social life or work.

tags.name: Disability
tags.description: A work that features one or more characters with a physical, mental, cognitive, or developmental condition that impairs, interferes with, or limits the person's ability to engage in certain tasks or actions.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Parkour
tags.description: Centers around the sport of parkour.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Rural
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the countryside.

tags.name: Baseball
tags.description: Centers around the sport of baseball.

alternative: Anna Aveiro Nakamura dos Santos Moreira Cuccittini

node.description:
[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/関口可奈味)

Originating from [Production I.G](https://anilist.co/studio/10/), currently affilaited with [P.A. Works](https://anilist.co/studio/132/).

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/関口可奈味)

Originating from [Production I.G](https://anilist.co/studio/10/), currently affilaited with [P.A. Works](https://anilist.co/studio/132/).
Tomomi Umetsu is a Japanese director, episode director and editor.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/t_bamboo)

He grew up in Mexico because of his parents' work. In elementary school he read Ishinomori Shoutarou's Cyborg 009. Later he experienced the Yamato and Gundam boom, prompting him to be interested in animation. He started working as background artist, later becoming freelance. During that time Takeda got acquainted with Tokuhiro Hiragi and Tatsuya Kushida, whom he then helped establishing the art studio Bihou in 1993.

In 2005 he established the independent art studio Bamboo, which became a company in 2007.

(Source: AniDB)

[__Official Site__](https://yuzu-official.com/pages/people) | [__Instagram__](https://www.instagram.com/yujin_kitagawa/)

Yujin Kitagawa is a Japanese singer-songwriter and actor. He is leader of the folk duo _Yuzu_ with Koji Iwasawa.

(Source: Wikipedia)

PoMPoMs is a seiyuu collaboration formed by the main cast of the  Na Nare Hana Nare anime. The group is composed of voice actors [Rika Nakagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/159461/Rika-Nakagawa), [Yuki Nakashima](https://anilist.co/staff/128152/Yuki-Nakashima), [Larissa Tago Takeda](https://anilist.co/staff/123888/Larissa-Tago-Takeda), [Moe Kahara](https://anilist.co/staff/206358/Moe-Kahara), [Miku Itou](https://anilist.co/staff/118581/Miku-Itou) and [Manaka Iwami](https://anilist.co/staff/121821/Manaka-Iwami).

**[Website ](https://www.jbayes.com/) | [Twitter ](https://twitter.com/JordanBayes) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/a20thcenturyartist/)**

American Animator/Storyboard Artist with substantial experience in western animation and anime production. Currently affiliated with Tonari Animation.
